property_title: Two-storey Alanya City View apartment in Arcadia Residence Alanya
property_description:
Sometimes you find a place that just feels right from the moment you walk through the door. This beautiful duplex penthouse atAlanyaArcadia Residence is one of those rare discoveries – a home that combines the space and comfort of a house with all the conveniences of modern apartment living, right in the heart of one of Alanya's most sought-after neighborhoods, Mahmutlar.

Mahmutlar has this wonderful way of making everyone feel welcome. It's become incredibly popular with international families and couples who want that perfect blend of Mediterranean charm and modern convenience. The area buzzes with life – you've got everything from traditional Turkish markets to international restaurants, all within a community that genuinely feels like home rather than just another tourist destination.

This particular penthouse stands out for all the right reasons. With its two-storey layout featuring 2 bedrooms and a spacious living area that flows into an American-style kitchen, it's designed for real life. Whether you're hosting friends for dinner, enjoying quiet family evenings, or working from home, every space serves a purpose while maintaining that airy, comfortable feeling that makes Mediterranean living so special.

What really sets this place apart is how everything just works together.You're only 450 meters from the beach– close enough that a morning swim or sunset walk becomes part of your daily routine, not a special occasion. The large balcony with city views gives you that outdoor living space that transforms how you experience each day. And because it comes fully furnished with all the modern conveniences, you could literally move in tomorrow and start enjoying this lifestyle immediately.

The Arcadia Residence complex itself feels more like a resort than just an apartment building, with facilities that mean you never have to go far for relaxation or entertainment. For families looking for space and security, couples seeking their perfect Mediterranean retreat, or investors recognizing the enduring appeal of this location, this penthouse offers something that's increasingly hard to find – a home that enhances your life from day one.

A Home in Alanya That Actually Feels Like Home

Walking Through the Front Door

The first thing you notice when you step inside is how bright and welcoming everything feels. The entrance hall is surprisingly spacious – none of that cramped apartment feeling you sometimes get. The light ceramic floors really help bounce the natural light around, and there's plenty of built-in storage right from the get-go, which honestly makes such a difference in daily life.

The Living Space Where Life Happens

The living room is where this place really comes alive. Those big glass doors flood the space with light all day long, and the way it opens up into the kitchen means you're never stuck cooking alone while everyone else is watching TV. It's got that easy flow that makes entertaining feel natural rather than forced.

The L-shaped sofa is perfect for family movie nights or having friends over, and everything's kept pretty simple design-wise so it doesn't feel cluttered. The best part is how you can just step right out onto the balcony from here – it's like having an extra room that happens to be outdoors.

Kitchen That Works for Real Cooking

The kitchen is one of those American-style setups that actually makes sense. The white cabinets keep everything feeling fresh and bright, while the black countertops are practical enough to handle real cooking without showing every little mark. There's a nice mosaic backsplash that adds some character without being too busy.

Everything you need is built right in – oven, stove, the works. Plus there's a little dining table right there, which is perfect for quick breakfasts or when you want to chat with whoever's cooking.

Master Bedroom With a View

The main bedroom is genuinely spacious – you could fit a proper king-size bed without the room feeling cramped. What really makes it special are those glass doors that open onto the balcony. Imagine waking up to natural light and city views every morning. The furniture is elegant but not fussy, and there's plenty of storage space.

Second Bedroom That Actually Works

The second bedroom might be smaller, but it's thoughtfully laid out. With the two single beds, it works perfectly for kids or guests. They've kept the design neutral so you could easily make it your own – maybe turn it into an office or hobby room if you don't need the extra sleeping space.

The Balcony – Your Outdoor Living Room

This is where the penthouse really shines. The balcony is huge – big enough to set up proper outdoor furniture and use it like another room. You could have breakfast out there, work on your laptop, or host dinner parties under the stars. The city views give you something interesting to look at, and being up high means you get great privacy and fresh air.

For anyone coming from a colder climate, this balcony becomes your year-round outdoor space – something that completely changes how you live.

Social and Residence Features in Arcadia Residence,Alanya

Arcadia Residence is not just an apartment complex but a community offering resort-like features:

  • Outdoor swimming pool

  • Children’s pool and playground

  • Sauna and steam room for relaxation

  • Fitness center for an active lifestyle

  • Barbecue area for social gatherings

  • 24/7 security and camera system

  • Caretaker services

  • Open car park

  • Generator for uninterrupted power supply

  • Cable TV and satellite infrastructure

  • Proximity to bus stops for easy connections

These features ensure that both full-time residents and holiday visitors enjoy comfort, safety, and entertainment.

Who Is This Apartment Best Suited For?

Families

With two bedrooms and a spacious living area, the apartment is perfect for families with children. The large balcony expands usable space, while the complex facilities ensure children and adults alike have activities year-round.

Couples and Retirees

For couples or retirees, the penthouse provides just the right balance of practicality and comfort. Its modern design and easy access to both the sea and daily amenities make it an attractive choice for those seeking a slower-paced, yet connected lifestyle.

Investors

This apartment hasstrong rental potential. Its location just450 meters from the seaappeals to holidaymakers. The modern design, fully furnished condition, and building amenities make it easy to market for both short- and long-term rentals.

Investment Potential – Location and Design Drive Value

Arcadia Residence stands out not only for its design but also for its investment advantages:

  • Walking distance to the sea:Only about 5–6 minutes on foot.

  • Modern furnished interior:Ready-to-move condition attracts tenants immediately.

  • High rental demand:Mahmutlar is a preferred location for both expats and tourists.

  • Resale value:A penthouse unit with modern amenities maintains strong long-term value.

For investors, this property provides both steady rental income and the promise of appreciation in value over time.

Why Choose Luxury Estate Turkey as Your Real Estate Partner?

Buying property abroad is more than just a transaction—it’s about trust, security, and long-term support. AtLuxury Estate Turkey, we are committed to guiding you every step of the way.

We offer:

  • Expert Market Knowledge:We show only properties that align with your needs.

  • Legal and Administrative Support:Safe title deed transfer and full transparency.

  • Residency and Citizenship Guidance:Assistance with Turkish residence permits andTurkish citizenship applicationswhere applicable.

  • After-Sales Services:From furnishing to rental management, we remain your partner long after purchase.

  • Multilingual Communication:Our team speaks your language, ensuring clarity and confidence.

  • Flexible Options:Including inspection trips and tailored investment advice.

With us, your purchase is secure, practical, and profitable.

This is exactly the kind of property that demonstrates what we mean by that promise.When you find a home that ticks all the boxes – location, design, functionality, and investment potential – you know you've discovered something special. And that's precisely what this penthouse represents.

This3 room penthouse in Arcadia Residence Mahmutlarcombines a modern layout, spacious balcony, fully furnished interiors, and an unbeatable location just 450 meters from the beach. Designed for comfort, practicality, and investment value, it is suitable for families, couples, retirees, and investors alike.

property_title: Luxury Furnished Apartment Only 300m from the Sea in Alanya
property_description:
Luxury 3 Room Apartment for Sale in Alanya – 95 m², Fully Furnished, and Just 300m to the Sea

If you are looking for a stylishapartment for sale in Alanya Mahmutlar, this fully furnished 95 m² property offers everything you need for modern Mediterranean living. With 3 rooms (two bedrooms and a spacious living room with an open kitchen), a balcony, and high-end furniture, the apartment is move-in ready. Combined with its excellent location just 300 meters from the beach, the property appeals to families, seasonal residents, and investors alike.

Mahmutlar – A Peaceful and International District of Alanya

Mahmutlar stretches along the Mediterranean coastline, framed by sandy beaches on one side and the Taurus Mountains on the other. The district lies only 10 km east of Alanya center, yet it has grown into a self-sufficient town where everything you need for daily life is within reach.

The area is especially popular among foreigners. An expat community thrives here, creating an international atmosphere where locals and newcomers share the same cafés, markets, and public spaces. Weekly markets, such as the Tuesday bazaar, offer fresh fruits, vegetables, local cheeses, and spices. Meanwhile, supermarkets, butchers, bakeries, and hardware stores are scattered throughout the town.

Moreover, Mahmutlar’s long coastline provides easy access to sandy beaches and water sports, while the backstreets lead to the foothills of the Taurus Mountains. This unique combination allows residents to enjoy both beach days and mountain hikes. Families appreciate the wide choice of playgrounds, gyms, and hamams, while cycling enthusiasts use the well-planned routes along the coast and into the countryside.

Transportation is frequent and convenient. Local minibuses run every few minutes to Alanya center, while taxis are available almost everywhere. Shopping centers such as Yekta Mall and Akdeniz Park ensure that modern retail options are within easy reach, and a growing variety of cafés and restaurants—including international chains—enrich daily life.

Consequently, Mahmutlar has become one of Alanya’s most desirable districts, balancing calm residential comfort with vibrant tourism and international culture.

Interior Design – Modern, Luxurious, and Move-In Ready

This3 room apartment in Mahmutlarspans 95 m² and comes fully furnished with a modern and luxurious design. Every detail has been carefully selected to create a home that feels both comfortable and sophisticated.

Living Room and Kitchen – Open-Plan Comfort

The living room flows into an open-plan kitchen, reflecting today’s modern lifestyle concept. A light-colored L-shaped sofa brings freshness and spaciousness to the room. The curtains combine sheer tulle with heavy drapes, offering both elegance and practical light control.

The kitchen stands out with its bold contrast of white cabinets and black accents. A sleek black glass backsplash gives the space a contemporary edge, while the glossy surfaces reflect light and add depth. The dining area introduces a vibrant touch with mustard-yellow chairs, which energize the entire atmosphere.

Bedrooms – Style and Functionality Combined

  • Master Bedroom:Designed in sophisticated grey and orange tones, the master bedroom includes a marble-patterned wall panel behind the bed, creating a luxurious focal point. Spotlights and elegant curtains add to the refined ambiance, turning this room into a personal retreat.

  • Second Bedroom:The second room is arranged as a youth or children’s bedroom with two separate beds. A modern wallpaper design enhances the room’s playful yet clean look, making it versatile for guests, children, or even a home office.

Decoration Details – Carefully Chosen for Elegance

Lighting plays a central role in the overall design. LED ceiling spotlights brighten the rooms while visually expanding the space. Light-colored furniture contributes to an airy and spacious perception, while large wall paintings and decorative details bring personality and character to the apartment.

Balcony – A Private Outdoor Escape

The balcony is large and inviting, set up with a white table and chairs that create a cozy outdoor dining area. Whether enjoying a morning coffee, evening meals, or simply soaking in the fresh air, this space enhances the home’s appeal. The view over the city and the short distance to the sea make the balcony a true highlight.

Complex Facilities – Resort-Style Living

The apartment belongs to a modern residential complex offering amenities that provide comfort, leisure, and security:

  • Outdoor Pool:A well-maintained pool for summer relaxation.

  • Fitness Center:Equipped with machines for daily workouts.

  • Sauna:Perfect for unwinding after a long day.

  • Barbecue Area:Ideal for family gatherings and friendly weekends.

  • Caretaker and 24/7 Camera System:Ensuring safety and peace of mind.

  • Parking and Easy Access:Open car park and elevator add daily convenience.

Therefore, residents benefit from a complete lifestyle package, combining home comfort with leisure facilities typically found in resorts.

Location Advantages – Only 300m to the Sea

One of the strongest advantages of this property is its location. The beach lies just 300 meters away—a short walk for swimming, sunbathing, or evening strolls along the coastline. Cafés, restaurants, and shops are equally close, ensuring that everything is at your fingertips.

Furthermore, bus stops nearby connect you to Alanya center within 10–15 minutes, making it easy to access the city’s vibrant shopping streets, marina, and cultural attractions. The proximity to Kargıcak and Kestel further enriches lifestyle choices, from quiet natural landscapes to riverside walking routes.

property_title: Affordable Apartment in Alanya Castle area
property_description:
When searching for apartments for sale in Alanya, most buyers expect high prices due to its unique location inside the historic peninsula. However, this furnished 4 room apartment with 110 m² living space and only 400 meters from the sea stands out as a cheap apartment in Alanya Castle compared to other homes in the area. It offers a balance of affordability, history, and lifestyle — making it suitable both for families and investors.

Interior Design and the Living Atmosphere in this Apartment in Alanya

This apartment already has a distinctive soul. Rather than a sterile, brand-new feeling, it delivers an authentic atmosphere:

  • Living Room: Traditional Turkish rugs, ethnic cushions, and classic wall decorations create a warm, lived-in vibe. The seating is comfortable though a bit aged, with bright tones adding freshness. Buyers seeking a modern touch may consider reupholstery or new furniture, but the current setup is fully usable.

  • Kitchen: A separate kitchen is a significant advantage. Cabinets are classic in design but could benefit from updated doors and tiles. With a light renovation, the kitchen can be transformed into a bright and functional space.

  • Bedrooms: One bedroom radiates bohemian energy with vibrant colors, sun-patterned textiles, and playful curtains. The second bedroom offers simplicity with plain tones and a white headboard, ideal for those who prefer a minimalist style.

  • Overall Style: A charming mix of traditional Anatolian rugs, bohemian accessories, and retro furniture defines the apartment. While it is perfectly livable as it is, modernization opportunities remain.

For buyers seeking anapartment with a view of Alanya Castle, this home offers city, mountain, and partial sea views, giving a taste of both history and nature.

Property Features

  • Furnished 4 room apartment (2 bedrooms + 1 living room + 1 separate kitchen)

  • 110 m² interior space

  • 400 meters to the sea

  • City, mountain, and partial sea views

  • White goods and electric water heater

  • Cash payment discount available

  • High rental potential for short-term holiday lets

  • Renovation potential for increased value

Building Features

  • 24/7 security cameras

  • Caretaker service

  • Barbecue area

  • Cable TV and satellite system

  • Close to the beach

  • Located inside the historical center

Why Choose the Alanya Castle Neighborhood?

Buying a historic house in Alanyais not just about owning a property; it is about living inside UNESCO heritage. The peninsula divides Alanya into east and west, creating panoramic views of the Mediterranean and Taurus Mountains. Within walking distance, you have access to:

  • The famous Red Tower (Kızıl Kule)

  • The historic shipyard (Tersane)

  • Damlataş Cave and Cleopatra Beach via cable car

  • Local souvenir shops, authentic cafés, and restaurants with castle views

This unique lifestyle cannot be replicated in newer districts. Living here means morning walks among ancient castle walls and evenings spent in traditional restaurants overlooking the sea.

Lifestyle Benefits for Different Buyers

  • Families: Spacious 110 m² plan with multiple rooms, close to schools and city services.

  • Investors: Anapartment for investment in Alanyawith high rental income from tourists seeking historic stays.

  • Foreign Buyers: The charm of living in a historic area combined with easy access to the beach and city center.

  • Young Couples and Digital Nomads: Move-in ready with furniture included, and potential to renovate for a modern, personalized style.

Everyday Life in Alanya Castle

Life in this neighborhood combines peace with practicality. Although daily needs can be met with small local markets, the city center is just a short walk away for larger supermarkets and shopping. Public transport, taxis, and even the cable car ensure easy access.

Cafés and restaurants in Kale Mahallesi are especially popular for their traditional breakfasts and romantic dinners. Imagine enjoying Turkish tea on your balcony with the castle walls in the background — this is everyday life here.

Investment Potential

The Alanya Castle area has limited housing supply due to its protected status. That scarcity creates value:

  • Properties in the historic center appreciate steadily over time.

  • Strong demand for short-term holiday rentals ensures high occupancy rates.

  • Renovation can boost both capital value and rental returns.

For those looking for acheap apartment in Alanya Castlewith room to add value, this property offers the perfect entry point.

Renovation Potential and Advisory

While fully livable, some areas could be modernized for extra comfort:

  • Kitchen cabinet doors and tiles

  • Furniture updates in the living room

  • Bathroom refresh for modern fittings

Instead of estimating costs upfront, buyers are encouraged to consult directly withLuxury Estate Turkey. Our team offers renovation advisory services, including:

  • Evaluating the property’s renovation potential

  • Connecting buyers with reliable contractors

  • Offering cost scenarios and timeline planning

This ensures that buyers can make informed decisions without guesswork.

Why Work with Luxury Estate Turkey?

Purchasing property in Turkey, especially in a historic area, requires trusted guidance. Luxury Estate Turkey acts as your reliable partner throughout the process:

Our experience in the Alanya market ensures realistic advice. Whether your goal is investment, residency, or simply finding a home with history, we help you achieve it confidently.

2 Room Apartment for Sale in New Level Cleopatra 2 – 600m from Cleopatra Beach

Being only 600 meters from the shoreline—around a pleasant 10-minute walk—means you can head to the beach for a swim, enjoy the sunset, or meet friends at a seaside café without even thinking about parking or transport.

The complex sits on a 3,030 m² plot and includes 58 apartments, planned with a focus on both style and practicality. Shared facilities are designed to make daily living more enjoyable, from relaxation areas to spaces that bring neighbors together.

What makes this location appealing is its balance: you’re close to supermarkets, shops, restaurants, and all the essentials, yet the beach is practically part of your daily routine. For anyone who wants a home in Alanya that offers a central address with the bonus of beachside living, this project is a strong contender—whether the goal is to settle in, enjoy holidays here, or benefit from the high rental demand in this area.

A Central Spot Where Everything is Within Reach

One of the best things aboutNew Level Cleopatra 2is how close it is to the places you’ll use every day. From your door, it’s only about 600 meters to Cleopatra Beach—close enough for a quick morning swim or an evening walk along the shore.

Alanya’s main shopping streets are just a short walk away, offering everything from small local boutiques to well-known jewelry stores. Around the neighborhood, you’ll also find plenty of supermarkets, cafés, and restaurants serving both traditional Turkish dishes and international favorites.

 

If you feel like exploring, landmarks such as Alanya Castle, the Red Tower, and the historic shipyard are all within easy reach. Getting around is simple: many residents prefer walking or cycling, and there are several bus lines nearby, including the 101 along the coast and the 202A/B towards Oba and beyond. Taxis are also easy to find at almost any time of day.

Project Overview – High Standards, Modern Design

New Level Cleopatra 2 has been planned withcontemporary architectureandnew generation construction technology. The result is a complex that not only looks elegant but is built to last. Every element has been considered—from underground parking to lush landscaping—ensuring both comfort and long-term value.

Highlights:

  • Rich variety ofsocial and recreational areas

  • Landscaped gardens with professional design

  • Closed parking garage for residents

  • Secure gated entry with 24/7 camera surveillance

This2 room, 52 m² apartmentoffers a functional floor plan that maximizes every square meter. While it is currently unfurnished, this allows the new owner to personalize the space according to their own style—whether that be minimalist, contemporary, or Mediterranean-inspired.

  • Living Room & Kitchen:An open-plan layout connects the living area with the kitchen, creating a sociable environment for everyday life.

  • Balcony:Perfect for morning coffee or evening relaxation, with views towards the city or the landscaped grounds.

The apartment’s size and location make it especially appealing for investors targeting short-term holiday rentals or professionals seeking a central home base.

Social Facilities – More Than Just a Place to Live

Life at New Level Cleopatra 2 comes with access to an impressive list of amenities:

  • Outdoor Pool & Children’s Pool– For relaxing summer days.

  • Jacuzzi & Sauna– Offering year-round wellness opportunities.

  • Steam Room– Ideal for relaxation after a long day.

  • Fitness Center– Fully equipped for a complete workout routine.

  • Waterslide– Adding fun for families with children.

  • Children’s Playground– Safe and engaging for younger residents.

  • Barbecue Area– For social gatherings with friends and neighbors.

  • Wi-Fi Free Zone– Stay connected in shared spaces.

  • Green Spaces– Landscaped areas with seating, trees, and flowers.

Moreover, theclosed parking garageensures your vehicle remains safe, while theopen car parkprovides additional flexibility for guests.

Lifestyle Benefits – A Day in the City Center

Living here allows you to enjoy the best of Alanya’s coastal lifestyle:

Morning – Start your day with a quick stroll to Cleopatra Beach, followed by breakfast at one of the stylish coffee shops nearby.
Midday – Shop at local markets or relax in one of the city’s green spaces.
Afternoon – Swim in the complex’s pool or unwind in the sauna.
Evening – Dine at a local restaurant, then walk home through the softly lit streets.

Everything is close enough that you can enjoy multiple activities in one day without rushing.

For Investors – Secure and Profitable

Central Alanya properties—especially those within walking distance of Cleopatra Beach—are among the most sought-after in the region. Factors that make this apartment a strong investment:

  • High Rental Potential:Short-term holiday rentals are in high demand, especially during summer months.

  • Capital Appreciation:Central projects with modern construction tend to hold and increase their value over time.

  • Flexible Use:Suitable as a holiday home, year-round residence, or income-generating asset.

The combination of location, modern facilities, and brand-new construction means this apartment is likely to maintain strong appeal for years to come.

Buying ahome in Alanyais an exciting step, but it’s much easier when you have someone local you can trust guiding you through it. AtLuxury Estate Turkey, we’ve spent years learning every corner of the market—so we know which neighborhoods hold their value, which projects are worth a closer look, and which ones are best avoided.

For clients who prefer to see everything in person, we organize viewing trips, and if you go ahead with a purchase, we cover those costs. property_title: Close to sea “Scandi-Turkish” Apartment for Sale in Oba, Alanya
property_description:
Bigger Than Your Average 2-Room – And That’s Just the Beginning

Let’s be honest. If you’ve been looking at 2-roomapartments in Alanyafor a while, you probably have apartment size fatigue. They’re almost always around 45 to 50 m². You see the photos, nod politely, and think,Sure, nice place… if I don’t mind doing a three-point turn between the sofa and the kitchen table.

Well, this one’s different. At70 m², it’s basically the “grande” version of a 2-room home—without the extra shot of espresso price tag. And that extra 20+ m²? It’s not just numbers on a floor plan. It’s the difference between squeezing in a dining table or actually hosting dinner without asking your guests to balance plates on their knees.

Oh, and did I mention it’s just300 meters from the beach? That’s not “sort of near” the sea—that’sgrab your towel and flip-flops, and you’re there before your sunscreen driesclose.

The Scandi-Turkish Style – Minimalist Meets Mediterranean Comfort

So what exactly is Scandi-Turkish? Imagine the clean, functional, light-filled interiors of Scandinavian design, but swap the icy silence for Turkish warmth. It’s minimalism that actually smiles at you when you walk in the door.

Here, the minimalist bones—open spaces, uncluttered furniture, neutral walls—are paired with warm wood accents, textured fabrics, and lighting that saysstay a while. You can almost feel both Stockholm and Antalya nodding in approval.

A Walk Through Your New Home

The Open-Plan Living Area

The moment you step inside, you’re greeted by a bright, airy space where the living room and kitchen merge into one open-plan design. This layout isn’t just about looking modern—it’s about living modern. Want to cook dinner while catching up on your favorite show? Or pour a glass of wine without missing a single story your friend is telling? This setup has you covered.

Moreover, the open design allows natural light to flow freely, making the whole place feel bigger than it already is (and at 70 m², it’s already got the upper hand on most).

Color and Light – A Thoughtful Palette

The walls and ceilings are dressed in soft beige tones, giving the home a calm, fresh vibe. Meanwhile, glossy cream ceramic tiles bounce light around the room, turning even a cloudy day into a bright one indoors.

Layered lighting takes things a step further: LED strip lights hidden in the ceiling create a cozy glow for evenings, while spotlights keep your kitchen work area perfectly lit. Therefore, whether you want soft mood lighting for a romantic dinner or a bright setup for an early breakfast, the control is literally at your fingertips.

The Kitchen – Clean Lines and Clever Touches

The kitchen is proof that functional can be beautiful. High-gloss white cabinets and a light-toned countertop keep things bright and modern, while a mosaic-effect backsplash adds just the right touch of personality. In addition, integrated white goods mean there’s no visual clutter—everything is streamlined.

The Dining Space – Contrast Done Right

Between the kitchen and living room sits a glossy white dining table paired with four black chairs. This pop of contrast keeps the space interesting without overcomplicating the look.

Consequently, the dining area feels like its own zone without needing walls to define it—smart use of space in every sense.

The Living Room – Where You’ll Actually Want to Sit

Anchored by a warm-toned brown sofa, the living area feels like a place you want to curl up with a book, binge a series, or host friends for coffee. It’s the kind of seating that says,Yes, stay for another cup.

A Bedroom That Balances Calm and Character

In the bedroom, the calming beige palette continues, but colorful LED ceiling lights give you the option to switch things up when the mood strikes. The bed frame, bedside tables, and dresser all share the same warm wood finish, tying the whole look together.

An oversized mirrored wardrobe isn’t just practical—it reflects light and makes the room feel larger. And because it’s a Scandi-Turkish space, practicality never comes at the expense of style.

The Glass Balcony – Four Seasons, One Space

Some balconies are for summer. This one’s for life. Enclosed with glass, it’s a breakfast nook in spring, an afternoon tea spot in autumn, and a cozy winter reading corner when you want to feel connected to the outdoors without braving the chill.

Plus, with the beach practically at your doorstep, you can step outside for sea air any time you like.

Who’s Going to Love This Apartment?

European and Scandinavian Buyers

Minimalism that’s warm and welcoming? Check. Bright interiors and open layouts? Double check. If you love the “less is more” philosophy but want to keep a little “more” in the comfort department, this home delivers.

Young Couples and Small Families

That extra space turns a compact 2-room into something you can actually grow into. A real dining area, a living room you can move in, and a bedroom that doesn’t feel like a storage unit with a bed—this is an upgrade you’ll notice every day.

Remote Workers and Digital Nomads

Oba’s quiet yet central location makes it perfect for working from home. In addition, you can literally replace your coffee break with a swim or a beach walk.

The Location – Why Oba is the Perfect Balance

Oba is one of Alanya’s most desirable districts because it blends modern living with local charm. You’ve got the long sandy beach for swimming, sunbathing, or water sports. You’ve got weekly fresh markets that feel like a slice of the Grand Bazaar.

In addition, everything is walkable—shops, cafes, restaurants, pharmacies, and even Alanya Training and Research Hospital. Frequent buses connect you to the city center in minutes, but honestly, you may find you rarely need to leave.

Cycling paths, tennis courts, and seaside promenades add to the lifestyle. Meanwhile, the neighborhood keeps a calm, residential vibe even during the summer season.

Complex Amenities – Everything You Need, Right at Home

  • Swimming pool for summer refreshment

  • Fitness center for staying active year-round

  • Elevator for easy access

  • Well-maintained common areas for a pleasant environment

These aren’t just nice extras—they’re part of what makes living here feel like a low-maintenance holiday every day.

Thinking Like an Investor? Here’s Why This Works

Oba has seen steady property value growth thanks to its location, amenities, and popularity among both local and foreign buyers. A fully furnished apartment just 300 meters from the beach is a strong contender in both short-term holiday and long-term rental markets.

Moreover, the extra size compared to most 2-rooms gives you a marketing edge. Bigger always photographs better.

Why Work With Us – The Luxury Estate Turkey Difference

Buying property in Turkey isn’t just about choosing a home—it’s about choosing the right partner for the process. We offer:

  • Accurate market insights– We’ll give you the real numbers, not just the sales pitch.

  • Full legal guidance– From contracts to title deeds, no detail is overlooked.

  • Multilingual support– We speak your language, literally.

  • After-sales assistance– Utilities, furnishing, and rental setup sorted.

  • Citizenship and residence permit help– If you qualify, we make the process smooth.

  • Viewing trips and flexible purchase plans– Designed around your schedule.

In short, we make buying here easy, safe, and tailored to your needs.

Time to See It for Yourself

This70 m² Scandi-Turkish apartment in Obaisn’t just a property—it’s a lifestyle shift. Whether you’re moving here full-time, investing for rental income, or planning a holiday retreat, it’s ready to welcome you.

Get in touch today to arrange a private viewing—either in person or via virtual tour. Let’s turn this bigger, brighter, beach-close dream into your reality.

This 60 m² apartment is being sold unfurnished, giving you complete freedom to design and furnish it to your own style. The layout includes two well-sized rooms, a practical kitchen area, and a bright living space that opens to a balcony where you can enjoy open sea and mountain views.

Large windows allow plenty of daylight, creating a fresh and airy atmosphere. Neutral wall colors and flooring make it easy to adapt the interior to a variety of décor styles—whether you prefer a minimal, contemporary feel or a warm, Mediterranean-inspired look.

Social and Recreational Facilities in the Complex

  • Landscaped garden and green spaces

  • Cable TV and satellite infrastructure

  • Open car park

The combination of these facilities ensures that residents can enjoy both relaxation and an active lifestyle without leaving the complex.

Location – Kargıcak, Alanya

Kargıcak is a peaceful coastal district located to the east of Alanya, known for its pristine beaches, lush green hills, and relaxed atmosphere. The area offers a slower pace of life while still providing easy access to the city and surrounding regions.

The beach here is always clean, with crystal-clear waters that are perfect for swimming. In certain areas, the rich marine life makes it an excellent spot for snorkeling and diving. Along the shoreline, you will find charming fish restaurants where you can enjoy freshly caught seafood with a sea breeze.

Kargıcak is also surrounded by agricultural land, giving the area a natural and unspoiled character. Yet, it has been developing steadily, with more residential complexes, local businesses, and services opening in recent years.

Everyday Convenience

While Kargıcak is more tranquil than central Alanya, it still has everything you need for daily living. Small shops cover essential needs, while larger supermarkets, banks, and shopping options are just a short trip away in Mahmutlar or Alanya city center. Public transportation is frequent and convenient—buses 1, 2, and 3 run through Kargıcak and connect to Alanya in about 20 minutes. Taxis are also readily available.

For dining, Kargıcak offers a mix of local Turkish cuisine and a few European-style restaurants near the hotels. Cafes are mostly family-owned, serving quality home-style meals. Many of the best fish restaurants are located close to the beach.

Activities and Lifestyle

Kargıcak is perfect for outdoor enthusiasts. Popular activities include nature walks, cycling, swimming, and horseback riding in the surrounding countryside. If you want more variety, Mahmutlar and Alanya offer additional entertainment, shopping, and nightlife.

The area is also close to natural attractions such as the Dim River (Dimçayı) and Dim Cave—both ideal for day trips. From many points in Kargıcak, you can enjoy spectacular views of Alanya Castle, the Taurus Mountains, and the Mediterranean Sea.

Investment Potential

This property’s location—just 100 meters from the beach—along with its sea view, modern complex facilities, and high rental potential, make it a smart choice for investors. Apartments in Kargıcak are increasingly in demand among both local and international buyers.     Behind the town, the Taurus Mountains invite residents to picnics, hiking, and cycling. On the coast, water sports and fishing are popular. Mahmutlar balances seaside leisure with green mountain landscapes, offering options for both active and relaxed lifestyles.

Alanya center never sleeps. Daytime buzz turns into lively evenings with restaurants offering cuisines from around the world, small cafés in backstreets serving affordable meals, and seaside venues with unforgettable views. Living here means being in the heart of everything.

property_title: Cozy Alanya Center Apartment in City Corner Residence
property_description:
2 Room Apartment for Sale in City Corner Residence Alanya Center – Compact Comfort in the Heart of the City

Not every apartment needs to be large to feel welcoming. This2 room apartment for sale in Alanyashows how thoughtful decoration and modern design can turn 60 m² into a stylish and comfortable living space. Located insideCity Corner Residence, right in the center of Alanya, the apartment combines the convenience of urban living with a calm, cozy atmosphere.

The first impression is brightness. White and beige tones on the walls and furnishings reflect natural light from the large windows, making the interior feel airy and inviting. Despite being in the middle of a busy city, the home has a peaceful vibe—proof that clever design can create balance even in compact spaces.

The balcony adds another dimension, offering views of Alanya’s urban landscape framed by the distant Taurus Mountains. It’s a spot where city life and natural beauty meet in one frame, making mornings and evenings equally enjoyable.

Interior Features – Modern, Functional, and Light-Filled

Living Room

The living room is decorated with simplicity in mind. A light grey sofa, a small pouf, and a round wooden table with cream-colored chairs create a seating arrangement that works without overwhelming the limited floor space. For a 60 m² home, the choice of minimal furniture makes all the difference—it keeps the room uncluttered and easy to move around in.

Accessories also play a role. A rattan shelf unit adds texture and warmth, breaking up the otherwise sleek surfaces. On the wall, a simple leaf-themed decoration provides a touch of personality without demanding attention. The flooring, polished marble-look tiles, reinforces the sense of space while staying true to modern taste. Overall, the style is a light mix ofboho and Scandinavian, blending functionality with natural details.

Kitchen

Connected to the living room, the open-plan kitchen is compact but efficient.White lacquer cabinetspaired with ablack countertopcreate a crisp contrast, making the area feel both modern and timeless. Built-in appliances and a washing machine are neatly integrated, leaving nothing out of place.

While not large, the kitchen is perfectly sufficient for everyday cooking. The contrast of white and black feels modern, while the glossy finishes keep the space bright. For buyers who value practicality in a central home, this kitchen ticks all the boxes.

Bedroom

The bedroom continues the calm and functional theme. Positioned opposite large windows, the bed receives plenty of natural light, creating a fresh morning atmosphere. The grey-toned headboard and base are kept simple, while the powder-pink bedding softens the overall look.

A white wardrobe provides both storage and brightness, ensuring the room doesn’t feel cramped. Beside the bed, rattan lamps and small wooden tables echo the natural details seen in the living room. This consistency gives the apartment a sense of design unity, small but carefully put together.

Balcony and Views

The balcony looks out onto the city, with the Alanya sign and Taurus Mountains visible in the distance. While the immediate view includes neighboring buildings, the broader scene blends urban life with the backdrop of nature. Many residents decorate balconies with plants, effectively creating a small garden in the sky. Even with limited square meters, it becomes a valuable extension of the living area—perfect for coffee, reading, or casual dinners.

Residence Features – Comfort and Convenience

City Corner Residence is designed for those who want both comfort and practicality. Facilities include:

  • Swimming pool

  • 24/7 camera security

  • Caretaker services

  • Generator for uninterrupted electricity

  • Barbecue area

  • Children’s pool and playground

  • Disabled-friendly access

  • Open car park

  • Satellite TV and internet infrastructure

These features make everyday living smooth and worry-free. For families, children have safe spaces to play. For professionals, security and caretaker services mean less to worry about. For everyone, the pool and communal areas provide leisure without leaving the residence.

Who Is This Apartment For?

Different buyers will find their own reasons to love this property:

  • Students and young professionals: With compact size, modern furnishings, and a central location, it works perfectly for single living or a couple starting out.

  • Young couples: Affordable, stylish, and close to the city’s social life, this is an easy first step into homeownership.

  • Investors: Afurnished 2 room apartment in Alanya centeris always in demand for rental. Short-term holiday rentals, long-term tenants, and even digital nomads all seek this type of property.

  • City lifestyle lovers: For those who want to walk everywhere—cafés, shops, restaurants, and beaches—this address is ideal.

Living in Alanya Center

Living in the heart of Alanya comes with endless advantages. Streets are filled with trendy cafés, boutique stores, jewelry shops, and global fashion brands. Restaurants serve both local and international cuisine, while smaller backstreet cafés provide affordable everyday meals.

Historic sites like theRed Tower (Kızıl Kule),Alanya Castle, and the ancient shipyard are all close, blending daily life with cultural heritage. For leisure,Damlataş Beachand theCable Carare within walking distance. Shopping options range from local markets to high-street fashion and electronics.

Public transport is easy to use. The 101 bus runs along the coastal route, connecting all major beaches. The 202 lines reach Oba, Tosmur, and other districts. Taxis are readily available at all hours. Essentially, living here means you are never more than a few minutes away from what you need.

Alanya center is vibrant, sometimes busy, but always alive. It is a place where you can shop, dine, swim, and enjoy history all in the same day. For buyers who want to be at the core of city life, this location is unbeatable.

Investment Potential

Compact, fully furnished apartments in Alanya center are always high in demand. With a size of 60 m² and a city-view balcony, this property is easy to rent out. Tourists look for short-term rentals close to the beach, while professionals and students prefer long-term leases near the center. Both markets ensure consistent income potential.

The fact that the apartment is in a central, established residence also supports value appreciation. As Alanya continues to grow in popularity, properties in the heart of the city hold their value and often rise faster than in outlying districts.

Trusted Advisors, Transparent Service, and Ongoing Commitment

At Luxury Estate Turkey, we understand that buying property abroad requires more than just an attractive apartment. It requires trust, knowledge, and ongoing support. Our team combines years of local experience with honesty and clear communication.

We guide you through every step:

  • Title deed transfers and notary paperwork

  • Multilingual support to ensure complete understanding

  • After-sales services including furnishing, utility setup, and rental management

Our clients know that the relationship doesn’t end once the purchase is complete. We remain available for advice months and years later, ensuring your investment is always supported.

Get in Touch

property_title: Scenic 3 Room Apartment for Sale in Stay Suite Residence Kargicak
property_description:
If you're searching for a modern andmove-in-ready home in Kargıcak,Alanyathis 3 room apartment in Stay Suite Residence may be just what you’re looking for. With its stylish interior, breathtaking views, and full furnishings, it offers a unique opportunity for both homeowners and investors—at a surprisingly affordable price of just €105,000.

Fully Furnished 3 Room Apartment in Stay Suite Residence – Modern Design with Scenic Views

This 3 room apartment for sale in Alanya is located in the peaceful Kargıcak area, within the well-maintained Stay Suite Residence. With a total area of 117 m² gross and 114 m² net, it offers a spacious yet functional layout, suitable for a range of buyers.

The property includes one bathroom, a southwest-facing balcony with glass film, and comes fully furnished with high-quality, modern furniture. Thanks to its thoughtful design and vibrant atmosphere, it stands out as an excellent lifestyle or investment purchase.

Apartment Highlights – Comfort, Light, and Style

From layout to lighting, every corner of this home reflects attention to detail and aesthetic awareness. Open spaces and well-chosen furniture create a seamless, comfortable flow.

Key Property Features:

  • Gross Area: 117 m² | Net Area: 114 m²

  • Layout: 2 bedrooms + 1 living room (3 rooms total)

  • Bathroom: 1

  • Balcony: Glass-panel balcony with panoramic view

  • Furnishing: Fully furnished

  • Orientation: Southwest-facing

  • Price: €105,000

The balcony and living spaces provide direct views of the mountains, banana gardens, and surrounding cityscape—bringing nature right into your living room.

Interior Atmosphere – Modern, Bright, and Elegant

The apartment radiates a vibrant and modern energy. Neutral tones dominate the walls and furniture—beige, cream, and natural wood—while colorful pillows, art pieces, and textiles add visual excitement.

Living Room:

Large windows and soft ceiling lighting make the space feel both cozy and open. A bright, eye-catching painting above the sofa sets the tone for the room. The seating area is furnished with modern, comfortable pieces arranged for both lounging and entertaining.

Kitchen & Dining:

The kitchen, integrated into the open-plan layout, is highly functional. With sleek cabinetry and efficient use of space, it connects easily to the dining area, which shares the same modern and cozy design approach.

Bedrooms:

The bedrooms are bright and thoughtfully furnished. Natural daylight pours in, especially in the room connected to the balcony. Functional storage and a soft color palette create an inviting and restful atmosphere.

View and Outdoor Living – A Daily Dose of Nature

Both the balcony and the poolside area of the residence offer stunning views. From the Taurus Mountains to lush banana fields and city rooftops, the scenery changes with the time of day and the season—making this home feel fresh and alive year-round.

The balcony itself is enclosed with protective glass film, making it usable even in cooler months while still enjoying the outdoors.

Why Kargıcak is a Hidden Gem?

Kargıcak lies on the eastern side of Alanya, known for its beautiful coastline, quiet lifestyle, and green surroundings. It is ideal for those seeking a more peaceful, nature-oriented place to live, without sacrificing access to city life.

You’ll find fish restaurants along the coast, clean beaches, and diving spots rich in marine life. The town is surrounded by agricultural land and growing in popularity with both locals and foreigners.

Public transport is easy and frequent. Buses #1, #2, and #3 connect Kargıcak to Alanya center in about 20 minutes. Taxis are readily available as well. Small grocery stores meet daily needs, while more extensive shopping can be done in nearby Mahmutlar or Alanya city.

For recreation, residents enjoy hiking, biking, swimming, and even horseback riding. The area is also close to popular destinations like Dimçayı and Dim Cave.

Kargıcak’s small center includes local cafés, restaurants, and a few European-style eateries near the hotels. Most dining options are family-owned and offer high-quality Turkish cuisine in a peaceful setting.

property_title: Residence Permit Eligible Apartment in Alanya, 70m to the Sea!
property_description:
What if your daily routine began just 70 meters from the beach in Alanya?

Not as a holiday, not as a once-in-a-while trip, but as your everyday life. In Alanya’s Oba, where long sandy beaches stretch for kilometers and where both locals and international residents create a lively community, this fully furnished property in Alanya offers exactly that possibility. Compact in size but rich in lifestyle benefits, the home combines a renovated interior, unbeatable proximity to the sea, and direct access to Oba’s vibrant weekly markets.

It’s more than a home — it’s a lifestyle reset, placing the energy of the Mediterranean right at your doorstep.

A Compact Home with Modern Personality

At 65 m², the apartment might seem modest in scale, but the design choices expand its character. After a thoughtful renovation, every corner has been optimized to reflect both function and style.

Living Room and Kitchen in Harmony
The open-plan kitchen flows directly into the living area, making the space social and easy to navigate. White cabinetry reflects light, while a dark countertop and grey stone-look backsplash create a bold, modern contrast. Ceiling LED strips add a contemporary edge, keeping the atmosphere fresh and youthful.

And then there’s the unexpected centerpiece: a vibrant pink L-shaped sofa. This playful choice injects energy into the space, reminding us that city living doesn’t need to feel muted. Instead, the apartment embraces color, making it instantly memorable.

Bedroom Simplicity for Restful Nights
The bedroom returns to calmer tones. Neutral walls and straightforward furniture layouts create a flexible, restful environment. A large window ensures plenty of daylight, while curtains add privacy when needed. The lack of built-in furnishings gives future owners freedom to adapt the space as they please.

Balcony – A Daily Stage for Life in Oba
The round-shaped, covered balcony is generous in size, and it works year-round. In summer, it offers shade and airflow; in winter, it remains usable thanks to its protective covering. Its position near the weekly market means residents can sit outside and observe Oba’s lively rhythm below. From morning coffee to evening relaxation, this outdoor extension of the apartment enhances daily life.

Flooring and Details
Glossy grey ceramic tiles cover the apartment, reflecting natural light and making the rooms feel larger. Contrast dominates the design: black-and-white furniture pieces against the pink sofa, neutral walls offset by bold accents. The result is an interior that feels compact yet alive, simple yet confident.

Living in a Place That Balances Ease and Energy

Oba is one of Alanya’s most practical areas, and this apartment’s location demonstrates why. Being only 70 meters from the sea means daily swims and seaside walks are part of normal routines. The western-facing orientation adds the bonus of evening sunlight, ideal for sunset moments on the balcony.

And then there’s the market. Oba’s famous bazaars, held every Monday and Thursday, are only steps away. Residents can shop for fresh fruits, vegetables, clothing, and even handmade items, all without needing a car. Combined with the variety of nearby supermarkets, cafes, and restaurants, this location keeps life both easy and vibrant.

Public transport is another strong advantage. Almost all bus lines pass through Oba, making it simple to reach Alanya’s city center or neighboring districts like Tosmur, Kestel, and Mahmutlar. For healthcare needs, the Alanya Training and Research Hospital is also in Oba, reinforcing the area’s reputation as one of the city’s most convenient places to live.

Who Will Find This Apartment Ideal?

Young Professionals and Couples

The modern renovation, energetic design choices, and compact scale make this apartment particularly appealing to younger buyers. The fact that it is sold fully furnished allows for an immediate move-in without extra expenses. Its central location ensures that nightlife, cafes, and the beach are all within walking distance — a lifestyle that many professionals and couples value.

International Buyers

Residence permit eligibility combined with beach proximity makes this home a smart choice for foreign buyers. Whether used as a holiday base or a permanent residence, the property provides the essentials international residents most often seek: security, practicality, and quick access to the sea.

Investors

For investors, the formula is clear: renovated interiors, central Oba location, and walking distance to both the beach and the market. These factors ensure strong demand for both short-term holiday rentals and long-term leases. The apartment’s manageable size keeps maintenance costs low, further increasing profitability.

Retirees and Seasonal Residents

Not every retiree wants a large home to maintain. For some, simplicity is key. This apartment suits that mindset perfectly: manageable in scale, easy to maintain, yet rich in lifestyle benefits. Being able to walk to the sea or the market makes everyday life stress-free, while the covered balcony creates a calm corner for rest and reflection.

Investment Outlook – More Than a Place to Live

Oba has become one of Alanya’s most stable areas for real estate appreciation. Its combination of local amenities, international community, and beach access ensures consistent demand. Properties near the market and beach, such as this one, carry particular value.

Moreover, furnished apartments ready for immediate use are highly attractive in the rental market. Holidaymakers appreciate being able to move straight in, and long-term tenants value the functional setup. With careful management, this apartment can deliver strong rental income throughout the year, making it not just a home but a working investment.

property_title: Spacious Apartment in Alanya Center Yekta Vizyon Park Complex
property_description:
Furnished 2 Room Apartment for Sale in Yekta Vizyon Park Alanya

If you are looking for a2 roomapartment for sale in Alanya, Yekta Vizyon Park offers much more than the typical city flat. While most two-room apartments in the area measure only 45–50 m², this property stretches to a spacious70 m², giving you noticeably more comfort in daily living. The home also stands out withtwo glass balconies, both south-facing and overlooking the city—features rarely found in apartments of this size.

The residence itself reflects amodern and urban lifestyle. It is designed for people who want the convenience of living in Alanya’s center while enjoying the privacy of a secure complex. With amenities such as fitness, sauna, a large car park, a lobby, and round-the-clock security, Yekta Vizyon Park combines city life with comfort in a way that appeals to professionals, couples, and investors alike.

Interior – Designed for a Practical City Life

The apartment’s interior focuses onsimplicity and function without sacrificing style. Entering the living area, you find an open-plan kitchen and lounge that create one unified, flowing space.

Thekitchenuses white cabinets with a contrasting black countertop and metro-style tiles. This clean and classic pairing works well for everyday use and is easy to maintain. The flooring distinguishes between areas: wood-effect laminate in the living section for warmth, and white marble-look ceramic in the kitchen for durability. Spilled coffee or cooking mishaps are no cause for worry—it’s practical and designed for real life.

Theliving roomis arranged with a large sofa and a sleek TV unit, emphasizing comfort for quieter living rather than big gatherings. LED spotlights and modern ceiling fixtures add a contemporary touch. The overall effect is modern yet understated—ideal for those who prefer a clutter-free environment.

In thebedroom, light-colored furniture and a modern wardrobe keep the atmosphere fresh. The layout is deliberately simple, leaving room for the new owner to add personal touches. Whether you prefer minimal décor or a more decorative style, this neutral backdrop makes customization easy.

The Highlight – Two Glass Balconies

Balconies often make or break an Alanya apartment, and here they are clearly the highlight. Instead of one, this home hastwo enclosed glass balconies, a rare feature in city-center living.

These spaces extend your living area and allow year-round use. Even in cooler months, you can sit comfortably behind the glass while enjoying city views. One of the balconies can easily be turned into ahome office cornerfor remote workers, while the other remains a social space for coffee breaks or evening relaxation. This flexibility makes the apartment suitable not only for permanent living but also for digital nomads seeking a balanced lifestyle.

Yekta Vizyon Park Complex That Adds Real Value

Yekta Vizyon Park is not just about the apartment itself—the complex adds significant lifestyle advantages. It includes:

  • Fitness center– Fully equipped for daily workouts without leaving home

  • Sauna– A relaxing space to recharge after work

  • Swimming pool– Ideal for hot Alanya summers

  • Lobby and caretaker services– Adding security and convenience

  • Large open and underground parking areas– A rare luxury in the city center

  • Barbecue pavilion and landscaped communal areas– Spaces to socialize and relax

  • 24/7 security and camera system– Ensuring peace of mind at all times

This combination of facilities makes the complex especially attractive to buyers who want the city center’s advantages but do not want to compromise on comfort or security.

Who Will Find This Apartment Ideal?

  • Young professionals– With fitness, sauna, and parking at hand, the apartment offers a lifestyle where you can work, exercise, and relax all in one place. After work, you can easily step into the city’s restaurants or cafés.

  • Couples– A modern, manageable space in the heart of Alanya, perfect for enjoying city life together. Everything you need—shops, beaches, transport—is within walking distance.

  • Investors– City-center apartments with social amenities are always in demand. This home offers strong potential for both long-term and short-term rentals.

  • Solo residents or digital nomads– With two glass balconies, one can serve as a home office, making it an excellent choice for remote workers.

Everyday Life in Alanya’s Center

Living in theheart of Alanyacomes with undeniable advantages. The streets are filled with shops, boutiques, coffee houses, and international restaurants. You are close to everything—from grocery stores and pharmacies to modern fashion brands and electronics shops. Jewelry stores and cosmetic outlets add variety, while the city’s malls and local markets offer plenty of shopping choices.

Touristic landmarks are never far. Within walking distance are theRed Tower (Kızıl Kule), the historicAlanya Castle, and the old shipyard. The famousDamlataş Caveandcable carto the castle are also nearby. The central location means you can combine sightseeing, shopping, and beach time all in the same day.

Transportation is easy. Public buses pass frequently, connecting you to all parts of Alanya. Route 101 runs along the coast, reaching every major beach, while buses 202A and 202B head inland to other neighborhoods. Taxis are available on every main street, making mobility effortless.

And of course, living in the center means you are close toDamlataş BeachandKleopatra Beach, two of the most famous beaches in Turkey. A morning swim, an afternoon coffee, and an evening stroll along the harbor—all become part of daily life.

Investment Perspective

From an investment standpoint, this apartment checks all the right boxes. Properties in Alanya’s center are always in demand, particularly those inside modern complexes with social facilities. This is not just a flat in a central building; it is part of afull-service residencethat appeals to tenants and buyers alike.

The larger-than-standard size (70 m² instead of 45–50 m²) makes it more comfortable for long-term tenants, while the two glass balconies provide extra appeal for digital nomads and younger renters. With the strong demand for centrally located apartments, rental returns are expected to remain high.

In addition, central Alanya has limited space for new developments, meaning supply is restricted. This naturally supports long-term property value growth, ensuring both rental income and resale potential for future owners.

property_description:
2 Room Apartment for Sale in City 8 Residence Alanya Center – Compact Modern Living Steps from the Sea

In the heart ofAlanya, where cafés, shops, and beaches are all within walking distance, a practical home can make life simple and enjoyable. This2 room apartment for sale in Alanya, located inCity 8 Residence, offers exactly that. With a compact but well-designed 46 m² layout, fully furnished interiors, and access to a modern pool and fitness facilities, it is a smart choice for those who want convenience without giving up style.

Just 50 meters from the city center and 750 meters from the sea, the apartment provides a lifestyle where everything is nearby. From morning swims to late-night cafés, everything you need is right outside your door.

Interior Features – Minimalist, Bright, and Functional

The apartment’s design follows a modern, clean line. Floors are finished with glossy porcelain tiles that reflect light and make the space feel larger. White-painted walls create a fresh background that enhances the sense of openness. Spotlights and pendant lamps bring in a contemporary atmosphere, making evenings cozy yet stylish.

Living Room & Kitchen

The living room features a grey L-shaped sofa with geometric patterned cushions, both modern and functional. Instead of a bulky TV unit, the television is mounted directly on the wall, which is a clever minimalist solution. The space could easily be personalized with decorative artwork, a mirror, or niche shelving to give the room more character.

The dining area adds contrast: a marble-look table paired with deep burgundy chairs. The combination is bold and works well, but placing a decorative vase, fresh flowers, or a soft-toned runner could bring additional warmth.

The kitchen is finished with glossy white cabinets and a black countertop, creating a sharp and elegant contrast. It is fully equipped with oven, stove, and washing machine, ensuring functionality in a compact layout. For those who enjoy cooking, upgrading the backsplash with modern tiles—like grey mosaics or shiny metro tiles—would instantly elevate the look.

Bedroom

The bedroom is simple but effective. A grey upholstered headboard sets a modern tone, while patterned bedding adds a friendly, lived-in feel. Switching to single-tone linens in beige, cream, or soft grey could create a more luxurious hotel-style look.

A large window and balcony door flood the room with daylight. Dark curtains are practical for sleeping, while adding wall art, a rug, or bedside lamps could make the room more stylish.

Balcony

Though small, the balcony is practical and inviting. A compact glass table with two chairs offers the perfect setting for morning coffee or evening tea. With a few cushions, potted plants, or even an outdoor rug, it could easily become a cozy extension of the living room.

Lifestyle in City 8 Residence

City 8 Residence is designed for modern living in the city center. Despite its compact size, the complex includes features that enhance daily comfort:

  • Outdoor swimming pool

  • Fitness center

  • Barbecue area

  • 24/7 security cameras and caretaker service

property_title: Gold City: From 5-Star Hotel Facilities to Your Own Residence!
property_description:
If every summer you come to Alanya and you’re tired of queuing at open buffets and racing to grab a sunbed, this property is for you. Instead of chasing a hotel reservation, you get a homeinsidethe city’s most recognizable resort complex —Gold Cityin Alanya— where the services feel hotel-level yet the apartment is yours to enjoy year-round.

A Resort Everyone Knows in Alanya

Gold City is one of those addresses people recognize on day one. The complex operates with hotel standards and residential comfort side by side, which means daily life here comes with a ready-made lifestyle: restaurants, bars, patisserie, spa and wellness, indoor and outdoor pools, aquapark, sports courts, cinema, bowling, billiards, and extensive green areas. Moreover, ashuttle to the beachsolves the only “distance” detail — the sea sits2.5 kmaway, but you’ll reach the coast without thinking about parking, traffic, or taxis.

Kargıcak itself lies on Alanya’s eastern side and favors space, scenery, and a calmer rhythm. Consequently, buyers who prefer privacy but still want fast access to the city often shortlist this area. Within that context, Gold City stands like a small city on its own, so everyday needs shift from “planning ahead” to “walking downstairs.”

The Apartment in Alanya, Gold City Complex

You’re looking at a3 roomapartment totaling100 m². The plan prioritizes clarity and comfort: a bright living area with an open kitchen, two restful bedrooms, and a practical bathroom setup that supports both daily routines and longer stays. Because the property isfurnishedandwhite goodsare included, you skip the furnishing phase entirely and move straight to living. Airy proportions, clean lines, and a soft color palette help the rooms feel bigger and calmer.

  • Layout:3 rooms arranged for effortless flow between living, dining, and cooking

  • Condition:Furnished,white goodsand essentials in place

  • Atmosphere:Hotel-inspired neatness blended with at-home comfort

Interior Mood — Calm, Modern, and Cohesive

The interior reads “relax” from the doorway. Light beige walls connect seamlessly with neutral flooring; furniture pieces in cream and sand tones create a restful base; blue accents echo the sea views and introduce a cool, coastal note without clichés. The open kitchen balances white lacquer cabinets with a dark countertop; it is a classic, timeless pairing that stays fresh as trends change. Therefore, the apartment feels current now and will age gracefully.

Bedrooms continue the same language: upholstered headboards, practical storage, and textiles in blue-gray shades. Mirrors and lighting are chosen to add brightness rather than drama, so the ambience remains gentle. The result is an interior that resembles a well-kept hotel suite but behaves like a private home — you control the schedule, the noise, and the guest list.

Balcony Life — Bring the View to the Table

Thebalconyacts like a second living room. A lively orange outdoor set lifts the neutral interior scheme and draws you outside. From here, the panorama framesAlanya’s green slopes,the Mediterranean, and, where the angle allows,the iconic castle. On slow mornings you take coffee with that horizon; on warm evenings you swap the hotel terrace crowd for your own quiet corner.

Hotel-Style Amenities You Actually Use

Because the apartment sits insideGold City, your daily life expands far beyond your front door. You won’t need a long bullet list to understand what this means; picture the week instead.

  • Morning swimsrotate between theoutdoor pooland theindoor poolwhen the weather cools. Children gravitate to thekids’ pooland theaquapark— which means energy gets spent before lunch.

  • Afternoonsbecome a choice between theprivate beach(reached byshuttle), thespa center(withTurkish bath, sauna, massage rooms, jacuzzi, relaxing rooms), or simple green-space walks. As a result, rest is built into your routine.

  • Eveningsbring options: on-siterestaurants,open buffet,patisserie,bars, andcafésif you want service; thecinemaif you prefer a low-key plan; orbowling,billiards, andtable tenniswhen friends visit.

  • Weekendskeep you moving:tennis court,football field,basketball,running tracks, and a completefitnessarea. Barbecue pavilions andgazebos (kamelya)cater to casual gatherings.

All of this runs under24/7 securitywithcamera systems, supported by agenerator,caretaker services, andcleaning optionsthat many residents use between guest stays. In addition, the complex structure includescommercial areasandhotel guest rooms, which keeps services lively and well maintained.

Daily Life Scenarios — How This Home Works Week to Week

For families who prefer comfort over crowds

Breakfast starts on the balcony. The kids are already asking about theaquapark. You check the time and decide to dotennisfirst, then pool time, then a beach afternoon. Because theshuttleruns on a regular loop, you don’t negotiate parking near the shore; you simply go when you’re ready and return when naps call. Dinner rotates between the apartment and theon-site restaurants— no reservation stress, no city-center traffic. Consequently, holidays feel like holidays, even in August.

For long-stay owners who want hotel perks without hotel rules

You return from a morning run on thetrack, cool down in thesauna, and book amassage roomfor Friday. Guests are coming next week; you pick up fresh desserts at thepatisserieinstead of baking. If the weather shifts, theindoor poolsaves the day. Maintenance?Caretakerandcleaning servicesexist for that. Meanwhile, yourfitnessroutine continues regardless of season.

For investors who think in occupancy rate and yield

This address sells itself. The phrase “apartment inside Gold City” has brand recognition, so your listing doesn’t need a long explanation. Furnished interiors andwhite goodsallow turn-key rental starts. Theshuttle, theprivate beachaccess, and the sheer variety of on-site activities broaden your tenant pool to families, couples, and friends traveling together. Therefore, occupancy potential rises across both high and shoulder seasons.

Property in Alanya — Why Gold City Complex Still Matters

When buyers search forproperty in Alanya, they compare beachfront proximity, facilities, and neighborhood rhythm. Gold City competes differently: it delivers aresort ecosystemthat compresses the practical parts of daily life into one managed environment. In addition,Kargıcakgives you open views, quieter streets, and larger green frames than you’d expect closer to the center. If you host friends, thecinema,bowling, andbilliardsare an elevator ride away; if you want calm, the balcony and gardens are waiting.

Because the complex includeshotel services, upkeep stays consistent and public areas remain polished. That matters after purchase. As a result, common spaces age more gracefully than in small, under-resourced sites. It is not only about today’s comfort; it is also about thelong-term valueof the environment around your home.

Investment Angle — Why This Apartment in Alanya Works

For a longer hold, your downside is hedged by utility: even if market cycles soften, this kind ofproperty in Alanyaremains livable and rentable because it solves daily needs, not just holiday dreams.

Who Will Love This Home the Most?

property_description:

Moreover, its interior has been thoughtfully renovated with a focus on natural textures, Mediterranean influences, and clever space usage—making it equally attractive as a full-time residence, holiday home, or short-term rental property.

Apartment Highlights – Location, Light, and Lifestyle

The apartment is located in one of the most dynamic areas of Alanya, placing you within walking distance of restaurants, shops, markets, public transport, and historical sites such as Alanya Castle and the Red Tower. However, what sets this property apart is not just its position—but itsemotive and tasteful interior.

  • Condition:Fully furnished with custom-made and natural-material interior

  • Heating & cooling:Air conditioning and electric water heater

  • Payment terms:Cash payment discount available

  • Rental return:High demand area with seasonal and long-term potential

In addition, the building offers 24/7 surveillance, a central location close to all amenities, and elevator access.

Interior Design – Natural Materials & Mediterranean Spirit

Color Palette & Atmosphere:

The apartment uses a soft, sun-washed color scheme—white, beige, light grey—combined with natural textures likerattan, linen, and wood. These tones create an airy and calming environment, where the sea breeze and daylight feel like part of the interior design itself.

Kitchen:

The mint green cabinetry is a bold yet serene choice, paired beautifully with awhite countertop and ceramic backsplash tilesin traditional Mediterranean patterns. Wooden open shelves offer both function and character, allowing the display of handmade cups, ceramics, and spices. Avintage-style Vestel fridgebrings nostalgic flair without compromising modern function.

Living Room / Bedroom Combo:

One of the standout features is the smart use of space—this room combines a sleeping area and a cozy seating zone:

  • Plush double bed with neutral-toned linens and layered pillows

  • Woven headboard, earthy poufs, and handmade rugs add texture

  • Rattan lighting and warm wall-mounted lamps create an inviting mood

  • Light wood shelves display small artworks and personal items

  • A large window and door open to the balcony with partial sea views

Spare Room:

Currently unfurnished, this room allows for flexibility—it could become a second bedroom, workspace, yoga studio, or creative hobby room. The built-in wardrobe with wood finish provides excellent storage and blends with the rest of the home’s tone.

Outdoor Space – Versatile Balcony with Panoramic View

The apartment features asingle spacious balconyenclosed with foldable glass panels, making it usable throughout the year—rain or shine. Its design allows you to transform the space from a dining corner to a relaxing lounge with ease.

  • Multi-functional setup:Furnished with a compact table, chairs, and a hanging swing chair, the balcony adapts to both meals and leisure moments.

  • View and atmosphere:From this elevated position, you enjoy sweeping views ofAlanya’s vibrant skyline, theturquoise Mediterranean, and the animated streets below.

Moreover, this outdoor area adds a strong emotional connection to the city—offering a place to unwind while staying immersed in Alanya’s rhythm.

Who Will Love This Apartment?

This apartment is not only visually striking, but also strategically located. It appeals to:

  • Lifestyle buyerswho value beach proximity, natural light, and soulfully designed interiors

  • Investorslooking for high-yield short-term rental properties in tourist-dense zones

  • Digital nomads or singlesseeking a centrally located, move-in-ready home

  • Couples or retireeslooking to downsize without compromising on charm or convenience

  • Design-conscious buyerswho appreciate artisan finishes and a calming atmosphere

As a result, this apartment bridges functionality and emotional appeal—standing out among cookie-cutter new builds.

Alanya’s city centeris an exciting blend of culture, convenience, and beauty. Whether you’re walking to the beach, visiting a historical site, or enjoying international cuisine, everything is within reach.

Local Highlights:

  • Cleopatra Beach– Renowned for its Blue Flag status and fine golden sand

  • Alanya Castle and Red Tower– Historical landmarks with unmatched views

  • Damlataş Cave and Cable Car– Natural wonder and scenic access to the hills

  • Shopping & Dining– From global brands to local artisan shops and cafés

  • Transport– Excellent public transport options with frequent buses and taxis

In addition, Alanya Center features a wide selection of affordable cafés, upscale restaurants, night markets, cultural festivals, and year-round events—making it ideal for all age groups.

Investment Potential – A Rare Find Near Cleopatra

Apartments this close to Cleopatra Beach are rare, especially those that come fully furnished and tastefully decorated. The area’s popularity with tourists and international residents makes it one ofAlanya’s top-performing rental zones.

Furthermore, with low maintenance costs and high daily or monthly rental rates, this apartment offers strong ROI potential.

Modern, clean, and well-lit, the bathroom features dark gray hexagonal and flat tiles, a wall-mounted sink cabinet, wall-hung toilet, and a frameless glass shower cabin. The overall design is sleek and easy to maintain.

Entrance Hall:

A built-in mirrored wardrobe houses the washing machine and adds extra storage, while also visually enlarging the space. The dark door frames and wooden finishes here mirror the apartment's overall cohesive look.
