If you’re seeking a home that combines peaceful surroundings with thoughtful interior design, this 3 room apartment for sale in Alanya,Stay Suit Kargıcak offers both. With its enclosed glass balcony, modern wood-accented interiors, and full sea and mountain views, this residence stands out as a rare combination of comfort, space, and style.

Fully Furnished 3 Room Apartment for Sale in Stay Suit – 1300m to the Beach, Glass Balcony

This 3 room apartment for sale in Alanya is located in the quiet and green district of Kargıcak, inside the Stay Suit complex. With a total area of 81 m², the apartment includes two bedrooms, a spacious living area with an open kitchen, and a fully glazed balcony usable year-round.

The property is just 1300 meters from the sea—close enough for easy access, yet far from the noise. It offers a calm setting where residents can enjoy fresh air, natural light, and relaxing views throughout the day.

Interior Features – Smart Layout, Soft Colors, and Functional Living

This fully furnished apartment is designed with a warm and inviting ambiance. Light woods, beige tones, and cream fabrics blend modern simplicity with homey warmth. The combination of natural materials and clean design lines makes the space visually soothing.

Living Room & Kitchen:

The open-concept living area includes a cream-colored corner sofa that adds softness and comfort. Bright yellow dining chairs introduce vibrancy, while the cohesive furniture layout enhances the sense of openness. The kitchen is designed with white cabinets and wooden accents, paired with rustic-style ceramic backsplash tiles. Modern appliances such as a built-in oven, stove, and refrigerator are included, offering both convenience and style.

Bedrooms:

Each bedroom features wooden bed frames, matching bedside tables, and large wardrobes. The standout feature is the master bedroom’s full wood-paneled headboard wall, which adds both a modern and warm design element. The second bedroom, ideal for guests or children, includes a similar natural theme.

Enclosed Balcony:

The enclosed glass balcony is one of the apartment’s key highlights. With a low-level seating corner, soft cushions, and scenic views, it transforms into a cozy nook perfect for every season. This space can be used as a breakfast area, reading corner, or small office.

The Stay Suit complex is built for easy, relaxed living. Green gardens, recreational spaces, and wellness-focused features make it possible to enjoy daily life without leaving the property.

  • Spacious outdoor pool and children’s pool

  • Sauna, Turkish bath, steam room, and fitness center

  • Massage room and outdoor gazebo

  • Landscaped green areas and walking paths

  • 24/7 security, camera system, and site caretaker

  • Generator, open parking area, and cable TV infrastructure

Whether you're relaxing after a long day or spending time with family, the complex offers everything needed for comfort and peace of mind.

About Kargıcak – A Calm Setting with Easy Access to Nature

Kargıcak is a residential area in eastern Alanya, known for its quiet atmosphere, green surroundings, and clean beaches. It’s a popular choice for those who prefer open space, slower pace of life, and a more natural environment.

The district is bordered by banana plantations and agricultural land. It offers access to walking trails, cycling paths, swimming spots, and horseback riding activities. Despite its natural setting, all daily necessities—markets, bakeries, restaurants—are within walking distance or a short drive.

Public transportation is convenient, with bus lines 1, 2, and 3 connecting Kargıcak to Alanya center in approximately 20 minutes. Taxis are also available. The district borders Mahmutlar and Demirtaş, and is close to local attractions such as Dim River and Dim Cave.

The area also offers a variety of family-run cafés, traditional Turkish restaurants, and a few European-style dining options. Many residents choose Kargıcak for its peaceful lifestyle, lush scenery, and impressive views of the sea and Taurus Mountains.

If you have explored Alanya beyond its busiest strips, you have likely passed throughKestel—and that is exactly whereHabitat Hill Residencerises. Built in2020and set550 m from the sea, the complex offers a practical resort-style setup with full on-site amenities. The apartment itself measures75 m², which islarger than many peers in its segment, and it follows a2 room layout: a living area with open (American) kitchen and one bedroom, supported by a comfortable plan that suits both holiday use and longer stays.

Floor plan and flow — practical daily living

The living room and open kitchen form one integrated space, so everyday routines feel simple and connected. You cook, host, watch a movie, and step out to thewide balconywithout breaking the conversation. Consequently, the apartment works well for couples or single residents who prefer an easy, low-maintenance layout that still feels spacious. Meanwhile, the single bedroom gives you a calm private corner, and the overall 75 m² footprint lets furniture breathe rather than forcing everything into tight corners.

Interior design — modern and classic, harmonized

This home stands out because it blendsclassic and contemporarynotes in a way that feels intentional rather than improvised.

  • Living area:Warmbrown toneson the furniture echo aChesterfield-inspiredlook, offering a touch of classic elegance. In contrast, aretro-patterned rug and curated accessoriesadd color and personality, so the room avoids becoming too formal. The result is a living space that feels both dressed and lively.

  • Kitchen:Glossy white cabinet frontspair with ablack, mosaic-style backsplash, creating a sharp modern contrast. Therefore, the kitchen reads clean and fresh, while the darker accents anchor the space visually.

  • Lighting:Abold red chandelierbecomes the room’s exclamation point—distinct and memorable. In addition,spotlightsandconcealed LED stripsdistribute soft, even light for evenings at home, giving the apartment a relaxed, contemporary glow.

  • Balcony:Thegenerous balconyis a true extension of the living area. For instance, you can set a compact dining table plus a lounge chair without crowding the space. Summer breakfasts, a book in the afternoon, or a breezy evening with friends—this balcony makes open-air living part of your daily rhythm.

Bedroom — a boutique-hotel mood

The bedroom leans moreclassic-luxurious:

  • Gold-framed decorandheavy drapeselevate the room with a formal, boutique-hotel feel.

  • Burgundy wallcoveringadds depth and warmth, so the space feels intimate after sunset.

  • Awhite leather headboardand a discreteblue LED accentintroduce a modern counterpoint to the classic elements.

Altogether, the bedroom feels dressed and composed—ideal for buyers who value a touch of grandeur without sacrificing modern comfort.

Site life — facilities that keep daily fun on-site

Habitat Hill Residence is designed so you can do most things without leaving the complex. In addition, the mix of facilities suits both short stays and all-year living:

  • Outdoor poolandindoor pool

  • Children’s pool / children’s roomandplayground

  • Aquapark

  • Fitness

  • Sauna

  • Lobby

  • Children’s garden

  • Indoor parking

  • Concierge

  • Barbecue area

  • Generator

  • Wi-Fi

  • 24/7 securityand camera systems

Therefore, whether you are unwinding after the beach or keeping kids active on non-beach days, the site covers the essentials and the extras. Meanwhile, indoor parking and a generator add the practical backbone that long-term residents appreciate.

Who will love this apartment?

  • Holiday home seekerswho want aready-to-enjoyplace a short walk from the sea, with on-site leisure and security.

  • Coupleswho enjoy amodern-classic mix—Chesterfield-style warmth, retro color accents, and contemporary lighting.

  • Investorswho prefer afurnished, rental-friendly setupwhere the scale (75 m²) and plan (2 room) meet steady demand.

  • First-time buyersin Alanya who need a manageable footprint without compromising on balcony size or site amenities.

Everyday scenarios — how the home actually lives

  • Morning routine:Coffee in the kitchen’s bright white palette, then straight to the balcony for sun without leaving home. Consequently, mornings feel spacious and calm.

  • Work-from-home days:The living area supports a small desk near natural light; the bedroom remains a quiet retreat, so zones don’t clash.

  • Evenings in:The red chandelier sets a cozy tone; spot and LED lighting let you fine-tune brightness. Meanwhile, the retro rug and accessories keep the room from feeling too formal.

  • Weekend hosting:Friends come over, kids gravitate to the aquapark or children’s room, and grilling at thebarbecue areabecomes a habit rather than an occasion.

Design notes a discerning buyer will notice

  • Thecontrastof white glossy cabinetry against ablack mosaic backsplashis timeless—easy to maintain and visually crisp.

  • Warm upholstery tonespair well with woods, brass, or matte-black metals if you decide to evolve the decor later.

  • Thebalcony’s widthallows flexible furniture layouts (dining set plus a lounge chair), not merely a single line of chairs.

  • Layered lighting(statement chandelier + spots + LEDs) gives you control; therefore, you can go from bright task lighting to soft ambient in seconds.

Investment and rental outlook

Because the apartment ismove-readyin a2020 complexwith aresort-style amenity stack, it aligns well with renter expectations in this segment. In addition, the75 m² scaleprovides more comfort than typical 2 room options, which can positively impact tenant satisfaction and stay length. Therefore, for buy-to-let scenarios—especially medium to long stays—the apartment sits in a practical sweet spot: close enough to the sea for seasonal interest, yet planned for everyday living. Furthermore, on-site pools, fitness, and security increase day-to-day appeal without requiring extra effort from the owner.

The living room is bothspacious and well-lit, thanks to its southern exposure and the use oflight tonessuch as cream and beige on walls and ceramic flooring. The combination of amodern beige sofa setwith amore traditional couchadds visual depth and character, appealing to different tastes without clashing.

Aglass-top dining tablepaired with metal chairs gives the dining area acontemporary yet minimalisticfeel. Positioned perfectly within the open-plan layout, it complements the rest of the room while allowing easy flow between living, dining, and kitchen spaces.

Kitchen – Warm Colors and Full Equipment

The open-plan kitchen featureslight brown cabinetry,integrated white goods, and a layout that balancesstyle with functionality. Whether you enjoy cooking daily meals or entertaining guests, this kitchen is designed to support it all.

Bedrooms – Natural Light and Practical Layout

Main Bedroom – Direct Balcony Access, Modern Touches

The master bedroom is painted insoft beige, matching the overall light and clean feel of the home. Ceramic flooring and awhite wardrobe and bed framegive the room a crisp and modern finish. The directbalcony accessallows in natural air and sunlight—ideal for both ventilation and relaxation.

Guest/Child Room – Multipurpose and Welcoming

The second bedroom is similarly styled withlight-colored walls and floor tiles. Asingle bedandsofain this room make it a flexible space—suitable as a child’s bedroom, guest room, or even a home office.

Residence Facilities – Resort-Style Comfort at Home

Atlas 1 Residence offers residents a wide range ofsocial and wellness amenities, including:

Families

The 3 room layout and110 m² of spacemake this apartment ideal for families. The complex’splaygrounds, green areas, water slides, and open spaces allow children to play safely while parents relax. Being within walking distance of the beach and markets adds everyday convenience.

This apartment offershigh rental potential, especially for short-term holiday lets. Its location, size, furnishings, and amenities are ideal forseasonal tourists, and the enclosed balcony makes it suitable foryear-round use. Furnished units with indoor pools and spas tend to perform well on rental platforms in Mahmutlar.

Holiday Home Seekers

If you’re looking for asummer house or winter retreat, this property fits both needs. Locatedjust 450 meters from the seaand equipped with spa-like amenities, the apartment provides a balance of seaside vacationing and home comfort.

Retirees

The complex’squiet setting, security, and wellness facilitiesmake it a great option for retirees. Being on amid-level floor with elevator access, close to the market and beach, and in a flat area of town, ensures everyday practicality and accessibility.

Mahmutlar is a well-loved district that blendsresidential livingwithtourism-friendly features. Locatedbetween the Mediterranean Sea and the Taurus Mountains, it offers a calm yet lively environment perfect for full-time living or holidays.

Key benefits of living in Mahmutlar include:

property_title: 100m to the Sea Apartment in Alanya
property_description:
What would it mean if your daily walk to the beach took less time than making a morning coffee?

In Alanya’s Oba neighborhood, opportunities to live this close to the sea are increasingly rare. Hotels and older developments dominate the shoreline, while new projects usually rise several streets away. Yet here is a home that breaks the pattern: a3 room, 100 m² apartment just 100 meters from the water, fully furnished and ready to move in.

For anyone searching for a property that balances convenience, comfort, and investment sense, this apartment represents a chance to claim both lifestyle and value in one of Alanya’s most desirable areas.

Interiors Prepared for Effortless Living

Stepping inside, the first impression is ease. The apartment comes fully furnished, including all essential white goods, which means new owners can settle in immediately without the hassle of furnishing from scratch.

The living room forms the heart of the home, offering a bright and welcoming space large enough for family gatherings or relaxed evenings. Two bedrooms complete the layout, each with proportions suitable for long-term living or guest accommodation.

The presence of anelectric water heaterensures modern practicality, while neutral finishes provide a versatile backdrop that adapts easily to different décor styles. Whether furnished for a family, a couple, or as a rental unit, the apartment offers flexibility and immediate usability.

Complex Features That Add Everyday Value

Beyond the apartment itself, the residential complex enhances daily life through a mix of social and practical facilities.

  • Swimming Pool– A refreshing retreat during Alanya’s warm summers, right within the complex.

  • Barbecue Area– Perfect for weekend gatherings and informal socializing with neighbors.

  • 24/7 Camera Systems and Caretaker Services– Security and order are maintained around the clock.

  • Parking Spaces– A key convenience for residents with vehicles.

These features transform the property from a simple living space into a lifestyle setting. For families, retirees, or tenants, such amenities create an environment where comfort and safety are a given.

Oba – A Neighborhood Where Life Flows Smoothly

This apartment’s location is not just close to the sea; it is embedded in one of Alanya’s most practical and enjoyable neighborhoods.

Oba is celebrated for its wide sandy beach and pedestrian-friendly promenade lined with palm trees. Here, residents enjoy the freedom to walk or cycle along the coast, stop at a café, or explore weekly street markets that bring the energy of a bazaar into everyday life. Mondays and Thursdays host these colorful markets, where everything from fresh fruit and vegetables to clothing and cosmetics can be found.

Moreover, Oba’s transport links are exceptionally strong. Nearly every bus line connecting Alanya’s neighborhoods passes through Oba, making it effortless to reach the city center or nearby areas like Tosmur, Kestel, and Mahmutlar. Essential services are also at hand, including supermarkets, restaurants of every variety, and Alanya Training and Research Hospital, which is located right in Oba.

In short, living here means combining seaside leisure with practical convenience in a way few other areas manage.

Who Will Find This Apartment Ideal?

Families

The 3 room layout (2 bedrooms + 1 living room) suits small families who want a home by the sea. Proximity to schools, parks, and the hospital adds reassurance, while the beach just steps away makes family outings effortless.

Investors

With Oba’s popularity among both locals and foreigners, rental demand is strong year-round. Holiday visitors value the beach access, while long-term tenants seek Oba’s practicality. Consequently, this apartment offershigh rental potentialin both markets.

Retirees and Expats

For those seeking a peaceful yet connected life by the sea, Oba provides everything needed — healthcare, social opportunities, markets, and reliable transport. The apartment’s fully furnished condition makes the transition simple.

Young Professionals and Digital Nomads

Close to cafés, restaurants, and the city center, this property also appeals to professionals working remotely. Reliable infrastructure and a vibrant local community combine with the calming proximity of the sea.

Investment Perspective – Why This Apartment Holds Value

Properties only 100 meters from the sea are rare in Oba, and this scarcity secures long-term value. When combined with the apartment’sready-to-move condition, furnished status, and on-site amenities, it becomes a particularly attractive rental property.

Buyers also benefit from potential discounts with cash payments, further increasing the financial appeal. With Alanya’s property values consistently rising and demand from international buyers growing, this apartment offers security for today and growth for tomorrow.

Choosing a Partner You Can Trust

Buying property abroad requires more than a good listing — it demands guidance, clarity, and after-sales support. That is where Luxury Estate Turkey distinguishes itself.

  • Clear Guidance from Start to Finish– From your first inquiry to receiving the keys, every step is explained and managed with transparency.

  • Legal and Residency Support– We help navigate paperwork, residence permit applications, and legal procedures with confidence.

  • Tailored Service– Whether your priority is investment, family living, or a holiday home, we align our recommendations with your vision.

  • Ongoing Support– After purchase, we remain available for property management, rental assistance, and resale advice.

For international buyers, we also arrange inspection trips — giving you the chance to experience Oba and view properties in person before making your decision.

Mahmutlar – A Balanced District Between Local Living and Tourism

Mahmutlar is a district that stretches along the Mediterranean coastline, framed by sandy beaches on one side and the foothills of the Taurus Mountains on the other. This duality gives the neighborhood a distinctive atmosphere: the calm of nature meets the vibrancy of a modern residential town. Located only 10 km from Alanya city center, Mahmutlar combines everyday convenience with a holiday spirit.

Moreover, the district has developed into an expat-friendly community where international residents live side by side with locals. You will find foreign-owned cafes, family-run Turkish restaurants, and international chains all within walking distance. Salı Pazarı (the Tuesday market) is a highlight, offering fresh fruits, vegetables, spices, and traditional textiles every week.

Transportation is easy and frequent. Local minibuses circulate within Mahmutlar and towards Kargıcak, while buses to Alanya center depart every 10 minutes. Taxis are readily available on every corner. For shopping, residents enjoy Yekta Mall and Akdeniz Park shopping centers, while small butchers, bakeries, and hardware stores cover daily needs across the district.

Furthermore, Mahmutlar offers a lifestyle tailored to both leisure and activity. The beachfront is perfect for swimming and water sports, while the mountains at the back invite you for hiking, cycling, or weekend picnics. Fitness centers, hamams, and yoga studios add to the variety, making the area equally suitable for retirees, digital nomads, and families with children.

Though compact in size, the apartment uses its45 m²efficiently. The open-plan living area connects the kitchen and the lounge, creating a sociable environment. Wide windows allow natural light throughout the day, while thenorthwest orientationkeeps the interior cooler during summer months — a detail many buyers appreciate in Alanya’s warm climate.

Thebedroomoffers enough space for built-in wardrobes and a comfortable bed setup, while the bathroom comes with amodern shower cabin and electric water heater. Tile flooring, neutral wall finishes, and practical layouts ensure the home can easily be personalized with your own furniture and decoration.

This property comes as aresale unityet feels brand new, thanks to its recent construction in 2023.

Short-term rentals bring strong returns thanks to the location, while long-term rentals attract digital nomads, couples, or retirees who prefer to live in central Alanya.
